title: The Fool
pullQuote: My yacht may have sailed, but my ship is coming in.
meaning: A fresh start with fearless energy. Say yes before you talk yourself out of it. Take the leap — but pack your lipstick and your boundaries.

title: The Emperor
pullQuote: If you’re going to take a shot at this B, you better not miss.
meaning: Own your authority. Build the structure that holds the vision. Lead with strategy, not emotion — and don’t apologize for being the one in control.

title: Ace of Cups
pullQuote: Pour into what pours into you.
meaning: A reset in the heart space. New connection, renewed compassion, a moment of sweetness. Let it in — and let it be real.
